about_the_game:
Welcome to Shooting Range Simulator!

Ever dreamed of running your own shooting range? Now's your chance. Manage your business, from selling ammo and renting out weapons to upgrading your facilities and expanding your inventory. Buy supplies online, attract customers, and watch your range thrive. It's all about precision, strategy, and making your mark. Ready to take aim?

Range Design

Craft your shooting range and its store, balancing both functionality and style. Arrange targets, set up shooting lanes, and create an environment that offers a top-notch experience for your patrons.

Stock Management

Order a variety of targets, firearms, ammos and accessories using an in-game computer. Organize your inventory efficiently in the storage room and ensure the range is always well-stocked and ready for action.

Customer Service

Assist customers with selecting firearms, provide safety briefings, and handle payments. Ensure every visitor has a safe, enjoyable, and memorable experience at your range.

Special Weapons Ordering

Unlock and order special types of weapons, from antique firearms to cutting-edge prototypes. Offer your customers a unique experience with these exclusive items.

Weapon Maintenance

Disassemble weapons and clean their parts to ensure they remain safe and functional. Regular maintenance is key to keeping your inventory in top condition and preventing malfunctions.

Expansion

Reinvest your earnings to grow your business. Expand the physical size of your range, upgrade facilities, and continuously adapt to meet the evolving needs of the shooting community.



In Shooting Range Simulator, take charge and turn your modest range into a premier shooting venue. Master the art of customer satisfaction and achieve financial success!

name: Shooting Range Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Run your own shooting range! Sell ammo, rent weapons, and manage upgrades to grow your business. Buy supplies online, attract customers, and aim for success. Can you build the ultimate shooting range? Find out in Shooting Range Simulator!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
